messages.content: Show me attacks by network segment in a bar

Here's a breakdown of attacks by network segment, showing the number of attacks recorded in each segment.

```sql
SELECT "Network Segment", COUNT(*) as count FROM attacks GROUP BY "Network Segment"
```

```db-chart
{
  "xKey": "Network Segment",
  "yKey": "count",
  "title": "Attacks by Network Segment",
  "data": [
    {"Network Segment": "Segment A", "count": 13273},
    {"Network Segment": "Segment B", "count": 13319},
    {"Network Segment": "Segment C", "count": 13408}
  ]
}
```
